news.title: Garmin Forerunner 570 review: running watch stumbles just short of greatness
news.summary: New model replaces the popular 265 and sits under the 970. It offers a similar look and feel to the top watch but with a few key features removed for a lower price. Super bright OLED screen, top tracking accuracy, voice control and calls on your wrist.

news.title: Trump announces Apple’s plan to invest $100bn in US manufacturing
news.summary: Trump celebrated commitment by Apple to increase investments in US manufacturing by an additional $100bn over the next four years. Tech giant’s plan to up domestic investment comes as it seeks to avoid Trump's threatened tariffs, which would increase the tech giant's costs.

news.title: Bernband’s alien landscape is the perfect place for digital wandering – just don’t expect a map
news.summary: Bernband is ‘a sci-fi exploration game for people who like to wander’ Players will be able to simply walk around a colourful and unusual world. With distinct, discrete areas that you can visit at any time, this is not a traditional open world adventure.
